role.argrole: thing being included in some group

example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تجمع) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM المئات)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN انصار) (NP (NOUN_PROP تشافيز))))) (NP-LOC (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC خارج) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN قصر) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئاسة)))) (NP-TMP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الجمعة))

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on tajam~aE
